welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Lynnfield, a charming town known for its historic New England architecture and quaint shops. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in the beauty and culture of our city."

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The original terminal at Logan International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Logan International Airport, serving mostly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Logan International Airport, serving mostly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: The international terminal at Logan International Airport, serving international flights from non-US airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a new login every 45 minutes.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and includes check-in counters, security checkpoints, and departure gates.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and charter flights, providing services such as customs and immigration clearance, aircraft maintenance, and fueling.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Boire Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Boire Field Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal.
